channel.title: Ask a Dutch person
channel.description: Yep, it's time to join the fad. Keep the questions mildly serious. If there are any other Dutch people in here that want to answer questions feel free answer them.

item.title: Ask a Dutch person

item.description:

Haha with that I meant that they pull a strange face because they don’t have the slightest idea where it is/never heard of it.

item.title: Ask a Dutch person
item.dc:creator: papernick
item.description:
Hazzmat:

How come Dutch don’t know anything about geography? When I meet random people and they ask me where I come from I say Montenegro and they are like :jizz:. Ok then I say I come from former Yugoslavia which is more known and they are still like :jizz:. Also Dutch people mostly can’t pronounce my name properly in Dutch.

so they jizz when you tell them where you came from? strange people.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a Dutch person
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
Hazzmat is right.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a Dutch person
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
Bolteh:

Nah, for Western Europe, Yugoslavia/Croatia/Serbia/Kosovo/Slovenia is the forbidden forest. Nobody goes there, nobody talks about it. Nobody wants to remember it, nobody wants to read about it in history books. Rule one of proper Europe Club: You do not talk about the failures of the past.

But to be fair, the entire patch of ground there is as pointless as a broken pencil.

Nah it isn’t that they don’t want to talk about t they are just dumb… Oh and we are not pointless at all. We got the Adriatic Sea and we are at least better than Romania, Bulgaria, Ukraine and all those other eastern bloc states.

Read full topic

idk. Many people I know are decent at it.

Ond kaja:

Pronounce this for me.

I guess phonetically in English: “Eck hah d’yuh poop’n”

Not sure though, but that’s how I would spell it phonetically.

item.title: Ask a Dutch person
item.dc:creator: Solokiller
item.description:
Belgians have to know both dutch and french, and then english on top of that for anything internet-related, some people use english more than dutch here.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a Dutch person
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
^What he said again. It’s retarded.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a Dutch person
item.dc:creator: Bolteh
item.description:
English is so prominent in Holland, that they even started taking english verbs, and “Dutchify” them… “Ik ga je fucken” instead of the proper “Ik ga je neuken” (I’m going to fuck you)… But then the Flemish turn it into an even more awesome “Ik goan a poepeuh” or “Ik ga dje poep’n”.

Aahh, language, tis fun.

But ye, the Dutch and the Flemish are generally pretty decent in English, the Flemish are even decent in hiding their accent, while the Dutch have a harder time hiding the fact that Dutch is their native language.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a Dutch person
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
^What he said basicly.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a Dutch person
item.dc:creator: Jeannotvb
item.description:
Winged One:

How many people speak English there? Is it a popular language to learn?

The English language is a part of the basic education in the Netherlands, everyone who goes to school in the Netherlands can speak and write English to some extent. I actually prefer the English language above my native language.

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a Dutch person
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
coolio:

do you smoke pot just because it’s legal?

pot?

POT?

POOOOOOOOOOOOOOOTTTTTT!?!?!?!?!?! GAAARRRRRRRRRRGHGGGH:rage:

jk

How many people speak English there? Is it a popular language to learn?

Read full topic

item.title: Ask a Dutch person
item.dc:creator: Jeannotvb
item.description:
Solokiller:

What’s your take on the current political situation? I heard there were multiple candidates for the prime minister job. Belgium is currently screwed in terms of politics, hopefully they’ll fall as well so we can vote someone better into office.

Mr.Shadow:

I only smoke pot when I want to

WOOHOO NO GOVERNMENT! But seriously, I think our prime minister is gonna be some huge asshole like always.

There’s a few potentional leaders, but for some reason people keep voting for far-left political parties - the ones that fucked up this country far beyond recognition already (and as you mentioned, once again their government collapsed, and guess what; people still want to vote for them, AGAIN)
What we need is balance, more right-wing politics.

Atleast the people aren’t voting for religious parties anymore, the last thing I want is some religious nutjob telling me how to live my life. :fffuuu:

Read full topic
